outreachTemplates.name: Product Review Request
outreachTemplates.subject: Collaboration Opportunity - Free Product for Review
outreachTemplates.body:
Hi {name}!

Love your content on {platform}! Your {niche} posts really resonate with your audience.

I'm reaching out from SellBuddy - we sell {product_category} products that I think would be perfect for your followers.

Would you be interested in receiving a free {product_name} in exchange for an honest review? No strings attached - just share your genuine thoughts!

Let me know if you're interested and I'll ship it out right away.

Best,
{sender_name}
SellBuddy Team

outreachTemplates.name: Affiliate Partnership
outreachTemplates.subject: Partner with SellBuddy - Earn Commission!
outreachTemplates.body:
Hey {name}!

I've been following your {platform} account and I'm impressed by your engagement rates.

We'd love to offer you an exclusive affiliate partnership with SellBuddy:
- 15% commission on every sale
- Custom discount code for your followers
- Free products to showcase
- Priority support

Interested in learning more? Just reply and I'll send over the details!

Cheers,
{sender_name}

outreachTemplates.name: UGC Creator Request
